item.title: About
item.description: whoami Hello ðŸ‘‹. My name is Jos Polfliet, and the reason I get up every day is to make the world more automated, more efficient and evidence-based. My specialty is in Machine and Deep Learning, with a special interest in Natural Language Processing. My passion is in applying Artificial Intelligence. That means I am committed and focussed on doing useful things with A.I. In the past and present, I had the opportunity so successfully apply Machine Learning at

item.title: Why?
item.description: Why do I work in A.I.? I believe that algorithms can make better decisions than humans. I have an undying, relentless optimism that even the hardest societal problems can be aided by applying technology and Artificial Intelligence. I’m a fanatic, even cult-like techno-optimist. I believe A.I. beats humans at many, many tasks and on many different criteria A well developed algorithm is more fair than any person, as we can explicitly control for bias instead of being driven by unconscious bias.
